data.text: @HCS_GovNL Open up on the 14th, Beware the Ides of March on the 15th, the irony!
@HCS_GovNL Wait until st Paddy's Day, omicron will have a Feild Day, watch how the cases rise then! This is terrible! Our government sucks !
@sharlenelawlor_ @HCS_GovNL Wish ignorant haters like you would move to US. You don't deserve to be a Canadian.

@HCS_GovNL Why are we only hearing about covid? What other deaths do we have? Let's get a break down if it's so important. Lets compare what people are dieing from so we know what to be scared of everyday....unbelievable

@HCS_GovNL Based on the numbers given:

26,972 (+1,244 new [443+332+469]) total cases
68 (+2 new) total deaths
23,667 (+838 new) total resolved
521,227 (+3,964 new) total tests
3,237 (+404) active cases
(3,216 + 21 cases not removed from data yet = 3,237)

@HCS_GovNL Seriously peopleâ€¦. If you all are afraid of restrictions being lifted, just stay home, continue to wear your mask and be antisocial. No one is stopping you. Before COVID, did you ever pay attention to the obituary section?! Highly doubt it. Move on.
@melhard22 @HCS_GovNL Add the opening right across Canada .They will be coming in plane loads after this . Do ur part to stay safe is all we can do.
@HCS_GovNL hope you folks are reconsidering lifting restrictions, seeing as this is where we are WITH some restrictions
@HCS_GovNL And mandates/restrictions being lifted in a week, up she comes

Sadly, we are reporting 2 deaths: one female between 70-79 years of age in the Eastern Health region, and one female between 60-69 years of age in the Central Health region. We send condolences to the families of these individuals.
